snippet: Trivia quizzes for smartphones feature chats, “trophies” for winners and the ability to play Facebook friends or opponents worldwide.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column compares range of trivia quiz mobile applications; recommends Microsoft scanner app Office Lens, which is available for all operating systems.
lead_paragraph: Trivia quizzes for smartphones feature chats, “trophies” for winners and the ability to play Facebook friends or opponents worldwide.

headline.print_headline: Take On the World in Trivial Matters, or Keep It Among Friends
headline.main: Video Feature: Take On the World With Trivia Game Apps
